short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time spent on each tab and URL with the Tab Time Tracker extension for better productivity and browsing habit management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Tab Time Tracker extension is a powerful tool that allows users to track the time they spend browsing the web, with detailed breakdowns of their browsing history on each tab and URL. This extension is ideal for anyone looking to better understand their browsing habits and manage their time more effectively.

With the Tab Time Tracker extension, users can easily keep track of the time they spend on each open tab in their browser, from the moment they create it to the moment they close it. The extension provides detailed breakdowns of the time spent on each URL visited on each tab, making it easy to see which URLs are consuming the most time and identify areas where time could be better managed.

This feature is especially useful for identifying patterns or habits that may be impacting productivity or overall well-being. By providing detailed insights into the time spent on each URL, users can better understand their browsing habits and make informed decisions about how to manage their time online.

Overall, the Tab Time Tracker extension is an essential tool for anyone looking to take control of their browsing habits and manage their time more effectively. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual browser, this extension can help you make the most of your time online and achieve your goals more efficiently.
